name: Helen BEVILACQUA, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Bevilacqua v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Helen BEVILACQUA, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 18th day of February, 2009, the Application for Appointment of Counsel and the Petition for Allowance of Appeal are hereby DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
966 A.2d 550
Helen BEVILACQUA, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 18, 2009.
